1168080.name: Fantasy Grounds - Meanders Map Pack: Victorian Mansion Special Edition (Map Pack)
1168080.description:
Meanders Map Pack: Victorian Mansion Special Edition

SPECIAL EDITION. This pack features 30 maps including a Victorian-style Mansion Setting, a large assortment of blank Mansion Area Templates for DM's to fill, a bonus pack of 28 Furniture Tokens to fill them and the Tramp Freighter Ship map from Shipstarter, my collection of ships. This unusual setting and first pack represents the primary tendril of my upcoming Lovecraftian Meanders which will provide a large array of additions to this genre and this map pack. It includes:
  • 13 Wooden/Marble Floor Blank Mansion Templates
  • 8 Victorian-Style Carpeted Blank Mansion Templates
  • 8 Fully Furnished Victorian-Style Mansion Maps
  • 1 Tramp Freighter Ship Map
  • 28 Victorian-Style Furniture PNG Tokens.
Maps are sized specially for FG at 1350x900 and under 500 kb each to help prevent slow-down during play. DM Convenience is the focus with carefully labelled maps and several ways to access, use and choose the maps in this module. Use the VISUAL MAP SELECTION PANEL and pick your map from the thumbnails and yellow label by clicking on the pin. Or use the RANDOM ROLL TABLES to pick your destination at random.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
